related_products.short_desc: Live GPS Tracking, AI-powered Smart Dashcams, ELD Compliance, Dispatch, and Maintenance. See the #1-rated fleet management platform.
related_products.features: GPS Tracking, Smart Dashcams, ELD Compliance, Dispatch, Maintenance, and more in a single, easy-to-use platform. Track vehicles, trailers, and equipment in real-time. Identify dangerous driving with AI detection and exonerate drivers with the Smart Dashcam. Easy-to-use and reliable compliance with the #1-rated ELD. Reduce maintenance costs with vehicle diagnostics and service reminders. All driven by insights from Motive's leading network of 350,000 vehicles.

related_products.short_desc: Whip Around is an intuitive and easy to use inspections and maintenance management software, making Fleet Management a breeze.
related_products.features:
Whip Around enables drivers to more effectively and efficiently complete their vehicle inspections so they can get on the road safely, in no time at all.

This inspection data is housed on our digital platform, giving business owners and fleet managers instant access to their inspections results and their fleets' vitals. 

Eliminate paper and spreadsheets and be proactive with fleet maintenance management - ensuring your vehicles are compliant and your drivers are safe.

related_products.short_desc: Manage vehicles, contracts, costs, insurances, and assignments easily. Keep a close eye on your fleet in just a few clicks.
related_products.features: Manage your vehicles, contracts, costs, insurances, and assignments without pain or frustration. Keep a close eye on your fleet in just a few clicks. Manage everything through Odoo?s user-friendly administrative system, which consists of fuel log entries, costs, and many other features. Manage leasing and all other contracts with ease. Supervise all contracts for vehicles, and receive a warning email when contracts reach their expiration date.

Routing chaos finally solved! Extremely easy-to-use, Route4Me plans routes for your business.

Call Today & Get Started

related_products.features:
Routing chaos finally solved. Extremely easy-to-use, Route4Me automatically plans routes for your business and dispatches them to a mobile app with built-in navigation. 

Perfect for field service, field sales, field marketing, territory management, and every business requiring last-mile optimization.

Call Today & Get Started

related_products.short_desc: Powered by Truckstop.com, the most-used, affordable & user-friendly fleet management software for small to medium companies.
related_products.features: Powered by Truckstop.com, ITS Dispatch is the number one trucking business solution in North America. With over 50,000 satisfied users, ITS Dispatch is the most affordable, easy-to-use web-based Fleet Management software for small to medium sized companies. You'll get the crucial tools needed to organize and grow your business, including IFTA processing, one-click invoicing, complete load management & Quickbooks integration with unlimited users & free expert support. Request a FREE DEMO today!

related_products.short_desc: Fleet Complete is a leading global provider of IoT solutions. We help you track your vehicles, equipment & mobile staff with ease!
related_products.features: Fleet Complete is a leading global provider of IoT solutions in the connected commercial vehicle space and mobile workforce management. We help businesses improve dispatching, fleet tracking, regulatory compliance and in-field staff management to achieve optimal productivity of assets and resources. We are constantly enhancing our IoT platform to ensure our customers and partners benefit from the latest technology and industry-driven capabilities.

related_products.short_desc: Streamline your fleet operations and reduce costs with Samsaras all-in-one platform for GPS tracking, safety, ELD compliance and more.
related_products.features: Streamline your operations and reduce costs with Samsaras all-in-one platform for fleet management. Live-to-the-second GPS tracking shows your vehicles in real time and pairs with rich reports so you can plan better routes, dispatch drivers at the last minute, and share accurate ETAs with customers. With integrated dash cams, driver safety scores, and automatic alerts for speeding, idling, and geofences, Samsara helps you protect your business and assets. Samsara is an FMCSA-approved ELD.

related_products.short_desc: GPS Trackit provides customized fleet management solutions to thousands of businesses across many industries. For HOS, see ELDFLeet.
related_products.features: GPS Trackit serves thousands of businesses, offering customized fleet management solutions tailored to the needs of each individual client. Their powerful suite of fleet management tools includes GPS tracking devices, real-time monitoring, detailed reporting, and cloud-based information management. These solutions help users reduce expenses and maximize profits with driver monitoring, route optimization, and many other features designed to help every business realize its potential.

related_products.short_desc: GPS Insight is transforming the way fleet and field service teams operate on the road and in the field with our innovative solutions.
related_products.features: GPS Insight helps customers engage their fleet by delivering innovative solutions and actionable insights. Organizations across North America turn to GPS Insight when they are sick of high fleet operating costs, are worried about safety on the roads, and have inefficiencies that waste valuable time and money. GPS Insight offers all-encompassing fleet software for organizations with fleets of vehicles, trailers, and other mobile assets.

related_products.short_desc: Fleetio is the #1 fleet management software platform. Optimize your fleet for profit. Start with a free trial or demo today.
related_products.features: Fleetio's suite of fleet management solutions helps fleets of all sizes remotely manage all fleet assets - vehicles, parts, small equipment and tools - and collaborate on critical tasks with the convenience of a smartphone and the Fleetio Go mobile app. Fleets can manage maintenance, reminders, fuel, vehicle inspections, recalls + more. Fleetio offers fuel card automation plus integration with multiple telematics solutions for automated odometer updates, DTC handling and fuel location reporting.

similar_products.short_desc: A real-world ready dispatch management platform for last-mile excellence.
similar_products.features: Locus dispatch management platform is an integrated platform powered by dynamic machine learning algorithms to simplify last mile dispatching. Its powerful automation capabilities enable modern enterprise businesses to fulfill orders, plan routes, manage time slots, track deliveries, and analyze metrics cost-effectively. Now organize, schedule, assign, and optimize last-mile deliveries with zero human intervention, maximize efficiency and bolster your growth with Locus.

similar_products.short_desc: Descartes Route Planner is web-based route planning software that improves operational efficiency through better route optimization.
similar_products.features: Descartes Route Planning software gives you the tools to maximize fleet and mobile resource utilization and efficiency. It enables your company to decrease costs, improve service, increase productivity and reduce environmental impact of your fleet. Continuously create optimal routes using fewer trucks, miles and drivers Seamless mobile integration for real-time tracking, performance, compliance, etc. Schedule appointments in real-time Streamline planning and productivity for mobile workers

similar_products.short_desc: A Connected Fleet Cloud that operationalizes fleet and asset intelligence to increase safety, productivity and efficiency.

IntelliShift is the ONLY fleet intelligence platform that enables businesses with fleets of vehicles and heavy equipment to EASILY access ALL fleet operations data from a single platform.

IntelliShift's solutions are designed to solve safety and operational challenges and can easily combine with the point solutions you use today to feed digestible views.

Leverage AI dashcams, telematics, inspections, maintenance, and compliance technology to drive better business outcomes.

similar_products.short_desc: OptimoRoute gets the job done. The easy-to-use software plans and optimizes routes for drivers or technicians in seconds.
similar_products.features: OptimoRoute helps fleet management businesses provide stand-out service. Using sophisticated algorithms, OptimoRoute plans and optimizes routes in a matter of seconds. Underneath a simple interface, there is an endless supply of tricks, features, and shortcuts. It's easy to use, flexes to your needs, and gets the job done. OptimoRoute customers cut fuel and driving expenses by 20% and free up time for more important things--like growing the business.

similar_products.short_desc: Onfleet's software simplifies your local delivery operations from start to finish. Start your free trial today!
similar_products.features: Onfleet's modern, delightful Fleet Management software makes it easy for couriers to manage and analyze their local deliveries. Onfleet includes intuitive smartphone apps for drivers, a real-time web dashboard for dispatchers, and automated SMS notifications and driver tracking for your customers. Our API allows for integration into online ordering and other systems. Our software has powered millions of deliveries for couriers in 60+ countries around the world. Start your free trial today!

similar_products.short_desc: Fully integrated freight, fleet, accounting & compliance. Our all-in-one platform is built for shippers, carriers, and brokerages.
similar_products.features: Every day, trucking companies throughout the country manage their businesses with our powerful, integrated, online Transportation Management System, Express Online. Whether you run Truckload, LTL, Intermodal or Brokerage, Express Online gives you the power to control your dispatch, accounting and fleet management with one TMS system available anytime, anywhere in the cloud.

similar_products.short_desc: SIMPLE Fleet Maintenance Management.  No GPS Tracking or telematics.  Easily track services, reminders, inspections, fuel, parts & more
similar_products.features:
Need something SIMPLE?  We don't offer GPS Tracking -  We focus on just fleet maintenance management.  We give you an easy way to track services, inspection checklists, setup reminders, track fuel, manage parts inventory & other important records.  

Our system is web based with a mobile app for both iOS and Android so you can manage your fleet on the go, anytime, anywhere.  Easily assign different users with permission control.

Try it risk free - No contracts with simple, flexible pricing

similar_products.short_desc: GPS Tracking solution for field services that enables you to manage all your trucks and equipment on one screen.
similar_products.features:
Momentum IoT offers advanced GPS telematics that you can buy online, with $0 hardware cost, and cancel any time. Rugged and modular, our Eagle 1 device installs easily into more vehicles and equipment, from pickups to tractors to trailers. Now you can see all your vehicles and equipment on one screen. Features Trips, Mileage and Idling Reports, Battery, Disconnect, Geofence, Speed Alerts, Asset Sharing, Diagnostics, Real-Time 10-second pings.

We now offer PTO and auxiliary equipment tracking!

similar_products.short_desc: Simplify fleet management while protecting high-value assets & improving ROI with fleet management software built for construction.
similar_products.features: Complete construction fleet management for your mixed assets. Manage anything and everything from heavy trucks & work vehicles, heavy & midsize equipment to small unpowered assets, attachments, tools & consumables. One centralized platform gives 100% visibility into the location, activity & utilization of your mixed fleet of assets. Remotely monitor & manage your construction fleet with an integrated system & a full suite of advanced solutions to keep you connected.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy and affordable, Driveroo fleet cuts inspection time by 70% and delivers instant visibility to issues so you can keep costs lower.
similar_products.features: Driveroo simplifies fleet management with an easy, affordable, mobile-native and web platform. Streamline operations from management to maintenance, including our breakthrough visual eDVIR that cuts inspection time by over 70%, while reducing errors and simplifying inspections. Driveroo delivers instant visibility to issues and provides a 360 degree view of your fleet operations to deliver faster, smarter decision making, reduce costs and downtime, and ensure compliance.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Equipment Maintenance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Equipment Maintenance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Equipment Maintenance software automates the process of managing equipment history and maintenance records. These applications help manage inbound service calls, schedule appointments, and provide dispatch and communication tools for technicians in the field. They also offer features like customer / location service histories, wireless communications integration, job location mapping tools and they integrate traditional business functions such as accounting, contract management, invoicing and customer relationship management into one convenient tool. Equipment Maintenance software is related to Building Maintenance software, Facility Management software, Field Service Management software, Mobile software and Service Dispatch software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fleet Maintenance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fleet Maintenance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fleet Maintenance software concentrates on repairs and the preventive maintenance aspect of managing business vehicles. Maintenance schedules, work orders, vehicle lifespan tracking, parts management, service records, etc. are typical functions for this type of software. Fleet Maintenance functionality would often be included as part of a more comprehensive Fleet Management package. For related solutions see also Aviation Maintenance, Equipment Maintenance, Maintenance Management, and Trucking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Maintenance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Maintenance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Maintenance Management software automates the tracking and scheduling of maintenance activities, enabling service organizations to operate proactively while reducing downtime and increasing operating efficiency. Maintenance Management applications can automate routine tasks while keeping track of scheduled maintenance service calls and converting completed work assignments directly into invoices ready to be processed. Maintenance Management software is related to Field Service Management software and Service Dispatch software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Towing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Towing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Towing software helps towing companies to manage their operations. Features of these applications include customer management, fleet and dispatch management, ticketing and lot management. Business features including accounting and billing systems. Towing software is related to Auto Repair software, Fleet Management software, Service Dispatch software, Transportation Dispatch software and Trucking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Transportation Dispatch software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Transportation Dispatch tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Transportation Dispatch software allows dispatchers to view, track and manage dispatch activities from one central location. These solutions can track courier, delivery, service vehicles and trucking data. Shipment needs can be matched with available resources where optimal routes and loads can be determined. Transportation Dispatch software is related to Trucking software, Fleet Management software, Shipping Management software, Courier software, Service Dispatch software, and Logistics software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Transportation Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Transportation Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Transportation Management solutions are cross departmental systems designed to automate multiple aspects of shipping and logistics, as well as transport availability and utilization to ensure optimal order and supply delivery.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Trucking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Trucking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Trucking software automates dispatch, fleet management, and maintenance for trucking companies. Trucking solutions can also be used for mapping routes and calculating industry standard ratings, practical miles, and fuel tax. These applications also often include driver log features, to regulate and record the number of hours operators spend on the road. Trucking software is related to Distribution software, Fleet Management software, Logistics software and Shipping software.

related_categories.description: Appointment Scheduling software streamlines the process of scheduling clients, patients, and meetings. This type of software promotes efficiency by eliminating double-bookings and automating scheduling of recurring appointments. It also allows employees to have real-time access to their and their colleagues' schedules, make changes to the system straight from the scheduling interface, and provide clients with the most suitable appointment options. Appointment Scheduling software often includes reminder tools that help ensure timely attendance of scheduled meetings and appointments. related_products.short_desc: Streamline your fleet operations and reduce costs with Samsaras all-in-one platform for GPS tracking, safety, ELD compliance and more.

With integrated dash cams, driver safety scores, and automatic alerts for speeding, idling, and geofences, Samsara helps you protect your business and assets. Samsara is an FMCSA-approved ELD.

related_categories.description: Equipment Maintenance software automates the process of managing equipment history and maintenance records. These applications help manage inbound service calls, schedule appointments, and provide dispatch and communication tools for technicians in the field. They also offer features like customer / location service histories, wireless communications integration, job location mapping tools and they integrate traditional business functions such as accounting, contract management, invoicing and customer relationship management into one convenient tool. Equipment Maintenance software is related to Building Maintenance software, Facility Management software, Field Service Management software, Mobile software and Service Dispatch software.
